channel.title: Comments on: 10 Questions with Apologies to Bernard Pivot & James Lipton

item.title: By: Alberto Luna
item.dc:creator: Alberto Luna
item.description:
Holy smokes Whit you are from Ojai as well?
Cool I was born in Ventura, but grew up for most of my life in Ojai damn I never would thought I'd meet somebody from my neck of the woods!
item.content:encoded:
Holy smokes Whit you are from Ojai as well?

Cool I was born in Ventura, but grew up for most of my life in Ojai damn I never would thought I’d meet somebody from my neck of the woods!

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: I can't wait to hear about your trip down the Grand Canyon! I've always wanted to do that. And I'm with your son - I highly recommend Iceland!
item.content:encoded: I can’t wait to hear about your trip down the Grand Canyon! I’ve always wanted to do that. And I’m with your son – I highly recommend Iceland!

item.title: By: Erin Hayes
item.dc:creator: Erin Hayes
item.description:
"...a well-developed glossary of profanity and the practice necessary to string the words together..."
I'm happy to know you, Whit!
item.content:encoded:
“…a well-developed glossary of profanity and the practice necessary to string the words together…”

I’m happy to know you, Whit!
